abstract: Congolese war criminal Germain Katanga, in custody since 2007, becomes first-ever convict to be released early by International Criminal Court.
lead_paragraph: The International Criminal Court granted early release to Germain Katanga, a convicted war criminal from the Democratic Republic of Congo.

headline.main: Hague Court Frees Congolese War Criminal
headline.print_headline: Africa; Court Frees Congolese War Criminal

snippet: The International Criminal Court granted early release to Germain Katanga, a convicted war criminal from the Democratic Republic of Congo.

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
